text: Franz "Teddy" Kleindin (July 20, 1914, Berlin - October 12, 2007, Berlin) was a German jazz and light music composer, arranger, and bandleader. He played clarinet, alto saxophone, and cello, and worked with Goldene Sieben, Hans Carste, Erwin Steinbacher, Willy Berking, Ernst van't Hoff, Willi Stech, Lutz Templin, Charlie and His Orchestra, Benny Goodman, Albert Vossen, Kurt Hohenberger, Corny Ostermann, Kurt Widmann, Georg Haentzschel, and Freddie Brocksieper. title: Franz Teddy Kleindin
